item.title: (WIP) Making sense of your tsconfig.json - episode 1
item.description: I recently needed to develop an npx executable, and wanted to code in TypeScript. I therefore had to run again tsc --init, and that’s where I decided to write this series of articles, with the goal to deeply understand how to choose my tsconfig.json configuration options. In this series, I will not review every single option to explain what their purpose is : I want to be able to understand globally the real nature of each of those options, I want to be able to make different configuration options choices, and understand why i will, when I will.
